trans-unit.source: Displays a check box user interface (UI) to use in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Exibe uma interface de usuário (UI) para usar na caixa de seleção um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display binary or ternary information presented through a check box UI.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridViewCheckBoxCell é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>usado para exibir informações de binárias ou ternários apresentadas por meio de uma caixa de seleção da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: In the default binary mode, the cells can hold values of `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: No modo binário padrão, as células podem conter valores de `true` ou `false`.

trans-unit.source: In ternary mode, the cells take on one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> values.
trans-unit.target: No modo Ternário, as células assumir um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property determines whether binary or ternary mode is in effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>propriedade determina se o modo de binário ou Ternário está em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>é o tipo de coluna especializado para manter as células desse tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é inicializada com um novo DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewCheckBoxCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Para as células dentro de uma coluna de padrões após um DataGridViewCheckBoxCell existente, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade até a célula para usar como padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades relacionadas a célula da coluna são wrappers para as propriedades nomeadas da mesma forma de célula do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Alterando os valores de propriedade da célula modelo afetará apenas células com base no modelo que são adicionadas após a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alterando os valores de propriedade de célula da coluna, no entanto, será atualizar o modelo de células e todas as outras células na coluna e atualize a exibição da coluna se necessário.

trans-unit.source: When the current cell is a DataGridViewCheckBoxCell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando a célula atual for um DataGridViewCheckBoxCell o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é sempre `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os valores de célula de caixa de seleção destinam-se para armazenamento, como outros dados, ou para executar operações em massa.

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja responder imediatamente quando os usuários em uma célula de caixa de seleção, você pode manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento, mas esse evento ocorre antes do valor da célula é atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar o novo valor no momento do clique, uma opção é calcular o que será o valor esperado com base no valor atual.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: Outra abordagem é confirmar a alteração imediatamente e manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento para responder a proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para confirmar a alteração, quando a célula é clicada, você deve tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: No manipulador, se a célula atual for uma célula de caixa de seleção, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> class to its default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> classe ao seu estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>valor da propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> class, enabling binary or ternary state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> classe, habilitando o estado de binário ou Ternário.

trans-unit.source: The standard operation of a check box allows for two states: checked and unchecked.
trans-unit.target: Permite que a operação padrão de uma caixa de seleção para os dois estados: marcados e desmarcados.

trans-unit.source: When the `threeState` parameter is set to `true`, an additional, indeterminate state is allowed, which is visually denoted by a grey partial check.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `threeState` parâmetro está definido como `true`, um estado indeterminado, adicional é permitido, visualmente, que é indicado por uma seleção parcial cinza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable ternary state; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable binary state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para habilitar o estado Ternário; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para habilitar o estado binário.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o método Clone sempre que derivam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>e adicionar novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula ser descompartilhada quando o conteúdo da célula é clicado.

trans-unit.source: ContentClickUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ContentClickUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula estiver no modo de edição; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the cell content is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula será não compartilhada ao conteúdo da célula é clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the double-click.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o clique duplo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula estiver no modo de edição; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o método CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.DataGridViewCheckBoxCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.DataGridViewCheckBoxCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.DataGridViewCheckBoxCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted value of the control hosted by the cell when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor formatado do controle hospedado pela célula quando ela estiver no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the cell's value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor da célula.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The assigned value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or is not of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*> property.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> é o valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>. - ou - é o valor atribuído <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou não é do tipo indicado pelo <> </> *> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is not of type <xref:System.Boolean> nor of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor atribuído não é do tipo <xref:System.Boolean>nem do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*>é o valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag indicating that the value has been changed for this cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um sinalizador que indica que o valor foi alterado para essa célula.

trans-unit.source: When a cell's value changes, it is marked as modified until that value is saved or the cell is reinitialized with data from its data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da célula for alterado, ele está marcado como modificada até que o valor é salvo ou a célula é reinicializada com os dados da sua fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's value has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da célula foi alterado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle de edição hospedado da célula.

trans-unit.source: This overridden property always returns `null` because check boxes only allow selection and deselection, not editing.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade substituída sempre retorna `null` como caixas de seleção Permitir somente a seleção e deselection, não para edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the underlying editing control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do controle de edição subjacente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the FalseValue property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade FalseValue de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a exibição da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>correspondente a um valor de célula <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a aparência de estilo plano da interface do usuário de caixa de seleção (IU).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> flat style is not supported by this cell type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>estilo simples não é suportado por este tipo de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property of the owning column also sets the FlatStyle property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade FlatStyle de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a exibição da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade não é válido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell display value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de valor de exibição da célula.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property value is `false`, the value of this property is the <xref:System.Boolean> type; otherwise, it is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> type.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>é o valor da propriedade `false`, o valor dessa propriedade é o <xref:System.Boolean>tipo; caso contrário, ele é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the display type of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de exibição da célula.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o retângulo delimitador que inclui a área de conteúdo da célula, que é calculada usando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a ser aplicado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que circunda o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the cell while it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado da célula enquanto está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: When `context` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value, this method returns an <xref:System.Object> that you can cast to a <xref:System.String> representation of the value.
trans-unit.target: Quando `context` inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>value, esse método retorna um <xref:System.Object>que pode ser convertido em um <xref:System.String>representação do valor.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns a <xref:System.Boolean> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método retorna um <xref:System.Boolean>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>valor, dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that describes the context in which any formatting error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> valores que descreve o contexto no qual ocorre um erro de formatação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the formatted value of the editing cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor formatado da célula edição.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*>é o valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o retângulo delimitador que inclui o ícone de erro da célula, caso seja exibida.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a ser aplicado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que circunda o ícone de erro da célula, se um for exibido; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado de dados da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle chama esse método para converter um valor de célula em um valor de exibição equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O controle passa o valor da célula para este método no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method first attempts to convert `value` to a <xref:System.Boolean> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties if they have been set.
trans-unit.target: Esse método primeiro tenta converter `value` para um <xref:System.Boolean>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>valor usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>propriedades se eles tiverem sido definidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se a conversão for bem-sucedida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum manipulador para este evento ou os conjuntos de manipulador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, uma exceção será lançada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful or there is a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event and it does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se a conversão for bem-sucedida ou não há um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>evento e ele não define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>manipulador de eventos pode modificar tanto `value` e `cellStyle`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: Se o manipulador não definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, no entanto, esse método formatos `value` usando as propriedades de formatação a `cellStyle` objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can result in an additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode resultar em mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is successful and the `context` parameter value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value, this method returns the <xref:System.String> version of the formatted value for copying to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Se a formatação for bem-sucedida e o `context` inclui o valor do parâmetro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor, esse método retorna o <xref:System.String>versão do valor formatado para copiar na área de transferência.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns the formatted value for display in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método retorna o valor formatado para exibição no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The value to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> em vigor para a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> associated with the value type that provides custom conversion to the formatted value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> associado com o tipo de valor que fornece conversão personalizada para o tipo de valor formatado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não há tal conversão personalizada é necessária.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> associated with the formatted value type that provides custom conversion from the value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> associado com o tipo de valor formatado que fornece personalizados de conversão do tipo de valor, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não há tal conversão personalizada é necessária.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values describing the context in which the formatted value is needed.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> valores que descrevem o contexto no qual o valor formatado é necessário.

trans-unit.source: The value of the cell's data after formatting has been applied or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell is not part of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor dos dados da célula após a aplicação da formatação ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a célula não é parte de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho preferido, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para desenhar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha de base zero da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho máximo permitido a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho preferido, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um indeterminado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, e as propriedades de IndeterminateValue determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the IndeterminateValue property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade IndeterminateValue de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a exibição da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>correspondente a um indeterminado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> valor da célula.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell is unshared when a key is pressed while the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula é descompartilhada quando uma tecla é pressionada enquanto a célula tem foco.

trans-unit.source: KeyDownUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: KeyDownUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A>com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumento tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the key press.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o pressionamento da tecla.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SPACE key is pressed and the CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT keys are all not pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o espaço é pressionada e nem todas pressionadas as teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell is unshared when a key is released while the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula é descompartilhada quando uma tecla é liberada enquanto a célula tem foco.

trans-unit.target: KeyUpUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyUp%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyUp%2A>com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumento tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the key press.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o pressionamento da tecla.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SPACE key is released; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave de espaço for liberada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula ser descompartilhada quando o botão do mouse é pressionado enquanto o ponteiro está sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: Pressing the mouse button always unshares a row containing a cell of this type.
trans-unit.target: Pressionar o botão do mouse sempre descompartilha uma linha que contém uma célula desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: MouseDownUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseDownUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseDown%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse pointer moves over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula ser descompartilhada quando o ponteiro do mouse se move sobre a célula.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.MouseUpUnsharesRow%2A>é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.MouseUpUnsharesRow%2A>

trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was the last cell receiving a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula foi a última célula receber um clique do mouse; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula ser descompartilhada quando o ponteiro do mouse sai da célula.

trans-unit.target: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is not in the normal state; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the button is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão não estiver no estado normal; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o botão estiver no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha que contém a célula ser descompartilhada quando o botão do mouse é liberado enquanto o ponteiro está sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: For this cell type, releasing the mouse while the pointer is over the cell always unshares the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Para esse tipo de célula, liberar o mouse enquanto o ponteiro está sobre a célula sempre descompartilha a linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: MouseUpUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseUpUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém estilos de borda para a célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: Converts a value formatted for display to an actual cell value.
trans-unit.target: Converte um valor formatado para exibição para um valor de célula reais.

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário edita um valor de célula e confirma a alteração, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle chama esse método para converter o valor exibido da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.
trans-unit.target: O controle, em seguida, define o valor de célula subjacente ou o valor da fonte de dados para o valor convertido.

trans-unit.source: This method converts the display value of the cell to an actual cell value using the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties if they have been set.
trans-unit.target: Este método converte o valor da célula de exibição para um valor de célula reais usando valores da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>propriedades se eles tiverem sido definidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> em vigor para a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the display value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default converter.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> para o tipo de valor de exibição, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para usar o conversor padrão.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the cell value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default converter.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> para o tipo de valor de célula, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para usar o conversor padrão.

trans-unit.source: The cell value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula.

trans-unit.target: cellStyleis .

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType*>é o valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType*>

trans-unit.target: Esse método não é significativo para esse tipo.

trans-unit.target: Nenhuma preparação é necessária para este tipo de célula.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ternary mode has been enabled for the hosted check box control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o modo Ternário foi habilitado para o controle de caixa de seleção hospedada.

trans-unit.source: The third state in ternary mode typically represents an uninitialized or indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: O terceiro estado no modo Ternário normalmente representa um valor não inicializado ou indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property of the owning column also sets the ThreeState property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade ThreeState de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a exibição da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property, the cell ThreeState property does not automatically update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the associated cell style when you change its value.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário da coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>propriedade, a propriedade ThreeState de célula não atualiza automaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade do estilo de célula associado quando você altera seu valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the cell ThreeState property value to `true`, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você altera o valor da propriedade célula ThreeState para `true`, certifique-se de definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade do objeto retornado pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the ThreeState property value to `false`, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você altera o valor da propriedade ThreeState `false`, certifique-se de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ternary mode is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if binary mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o modo Ternário estiver habilitado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o modo binário é habilitado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de cadeia de caracteres da célula.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the cell includes the row index and column index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres da célula inclui o índice de linha e o índice de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa a célula atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the TrueValue property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade TrueValue de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a exibição da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>correspondente a um valor de célula <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de dados dos valores na célula.

trans-unit.source: If the ValueType property of the cell has not been set, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A> property for the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> is used, if the column exists.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ValueType da célula não tiver sido definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A>propriedade para a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>for usado, se a coluna existe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no owning column exists, then this property is set to the default type appropriate for its mode: <xref:System.Boolean> for binary mode and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> for ternary mode.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma coluna de propriedade existe, essa propriedade é definida como o tipo de padrão apropriado para o modo: <xref:System.Boolean>para modo binário e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>para o modo Ternário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>é o objeto de dados reais contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>propriedade é a representação formatada deste objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ValueType and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: ValueType e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados desses valores, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the underlying value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do valor subjacente da célula.</xref:System.Type>
